name: Dangle Earrings Sterling Silver Earrings Willow Creek Jasper Shiny Chandelier earrings B. Sasik
description:
Willow creek Jasper Earrings

PRINTED CIRCLES

I have so many stones. 
They are all fine tiny pieces of Earth's mysterious treasures and I love looking at them.
Looking for the one that speaks to me. 
They take their turns. These Willow Creek Jaspers were tucked away for months.
I always glanced at them and moved on. 
It was not yet their time.

These stones are Spring. 
They are the brightness of day surrounded by the sparkling sunshine.
They are the beach and the white sand.
They are the sounds of new season, the light breeze.
Clean, pure, innocent.
So is the Silver. Bright and polished.
Freedom and Joy.
Infused with my creative soul and the magical city around me.

These dangle earrings are made of light Sterling Silver sheet. 
I hand shaped, imprinted and polished each piece and component.
I set in Fine Silver bezel the Willow Creek Jasper cabs .
The understated stones came out to shine in this bright Silver creation.
The neutral color makes them perfect to go with anything.
Fresh, light color and elegance.
The earrings are very light and hang from Argentium Sterling Silver wires.


They are about 3.25 " long including the ear wires. 

Signed

One of a kind.

name: New Orleans French Quarter Sterling Earrings Lucky Mojo Charm Earrings
description:
New Orleans Earrings

Lucky Mojo Imprinted on a Sterling Silver disc only here in New Orleans

The disc hangs from Argentium Sterling Silver handmade wires.
Earrings are oxidized and buffed to accentuate the design.

The Sterling Silver discs were rolled on one of the French Quarter penny machines.
The design can only be obtained in the French Quarter so you are buying something 
that is exclusively New Orleans.

name: New Orleans Jazz Pendant Painted Glass Pendant  Fused Glass Necklace
description:
New Orleans Jazz Pendant
Pendant Necklace
Painted Glass Pendant

JAZZ NIGHT



This necklace was hand fabricated from Sterling Silver. It is about 1 5/8" tall by about 0.75 " wide and features my signature hand painted fused glass cabochon. The paint I use is actually glass in paint form which once applied and fired fuses permanently with the base glass and cannot be washed off or removed. 

The metal was oxidized and buffed to reveal highlights on the raised areas and then buffed for extra shine and contrast.
Signed by the artist.

Hidden bail.
No chain is included in this listing.

Please do convo me if you need a chain.

The glass cab is painted and fired in a kiln. This process is sometimes repeated several times to achieve the desired color and effect. The glass is annealed each time before it comes out of the kiln.

One of a kind.
Pendant Necklace

MADE IN USA

name: Long Dangle Earrings Sterling Silver
description:
Dangling Earrings

These unusual earrings remind me of glass shards.
They are made of light Sterling Silver sheet. The pieces are pierced and pinned. 
There is no right and wrong side. No matter how they turn you never see the back side because there is no backside.

They are rather substantial and demand to be noticed. 
Lots of movement.

I used Sterling Silver wire to fabricate these earrings.

The earrings are suspended from a fancy chain.

They are about 4 1/8" long including the ear wires. 
The earrings are about 3.75" wide. 

All Silver was oxidized for definition and contrast.

name: NOLA JAZZ Necklace Sterling Silver B. Sasik
description:
NOLA JAZZ

This necklace was hand fabricated from Sterling Silver. It is about 1 3/4" tall by about 1 1/4" wide and features my signature hand painted fused glass cabochon.

New Orleans Jazz player in the French Quarter is set in a Sterling Silver frame with shiny Silver balls for accents.
The chain is about 32" long and can be made shorter or longer upon request. I like long necklaces. They are also great for layering. The second picture shows the necklace on a short chain, but if you want it short please condo me first with the length you want it to be.
The necklace closes in the back with a handmade hook. I included special connectors to prevent the necklace from twisting.

The paint is actually glass in paint form which once applied and fired fuses permanently with the base glass and cannot be washed off or removed. 
Signed by the artist.

All Silver was oxidized and buffed to reveal highlight and details.

The glass cab is painted and fired in a kiln. This process is sometimes repeated several times to achieve the desired color and effect. The glass is annealed each time before it comes out of the kiln.

One of a kind.

MADE IN USA

name: Chrysocolla Necklace Sterling Silver Necklace with HANDPAINTED Fused Glass Cab Silver Bullet
description:
DANDELION NECKLACE


This necklace was hand fabricated from Sterling Silver. Its focal pendant is about 2 3/4" tall by 7/8" wide and features two special of stones. The top Cabochon is my signature hand painted fused glass cab, next is a green/blue Chrysocolla with Malachite
Sperkly accent comes from a shiny, faceted Citrine.


TThe necklace is all hand made.
The chain is made link by link from roll milled square wire soldered together one jumping at a time. The wire links are all solid nothing hollow. There was a lot of Silver used for this. The chain and pendant are polished to a mirror shine.
I included my special links that prevent the necklace form twisting.

The chain is right around 24" long with a 2" extension and a handmade hook.
It can be made longer or shorter upon request.

The paint I use for my cabs is actually glass in paint form which once applied and fired fuses permanently with the base glass and cannot be washed off or removed. This is a true enamel. It becomes glass as it melts in the kiln. I do not use thermal hardening paints that are baked at low temperatures in a household oven. 
The difference is a rich color, smooth, glossy and permanent surface .

One of a kind necklace lovingly made in The USA

name: SUNFLOWER PENDANT Sterling Silver Pendant with Handpainted Enamel on  Fused Glass Cab by B. Sasik
description:
SUNFLOWER

This necklace was hand fabricated from Sterling Silver. It is about 1.5" tall by about 3/4 " wide and features my signature hand painted enamel on fused glass cabochon. 
There is dichroic detail on the glass. 
A shiny Citrine sits on top of a unique broom cast.
Signed by the artist.

Please do convo me if you need a chain.

The glass cab is painted and fired in a kiln. This process is sometimes repeated several times to achieve the desired color and effect. The glass is annealed each time before it comes out of the kiln.

One of a kind.

MADE IN USA

name: Pendant Fused Glass Pendant NecklaceSterling Silver Pendant Necklace Handpainted
description:
Pendant
Fused Glass Painted Pendant

ABSINTHE FAIRY

This necklace was hand fabricated from Sterling Silver. It is about 1.25" tall by about 7/8 " wide and features my signature hand painted fused glass cabochon. The paintI use is actually glass in paint form which once applied and fired fuses permanently with the base glass and cannot be washed off or removed. 

The metal was oxidized and buffed to reveal highlights on the raised areas and then buffed for extra shine and contrast.
Signed by the artist.

Please do convo me if you need a chain.

The glass cab is painted and fired in a kiln. This process is sometimes repeated several times to achieve the desired color and effect. The glass is annealed each time before it comes out of the kiln.

One of a kind.
Pendant

MADE IN USA

SUMMER POPPIES

The pendant measures about almost 2.25" tall including the bail by 1.25" wide.

name: Crazy Lace Agate Necklace Sterling Silver B. Sasik
description:
CRAZY LACE NECKLACE

This necklace was hand fabricated from Sterling Silver. The focal is about 1 5/8" tall by about 1 3/8" wide and features a one of a kind high quality Crazy Lace Agate cabochon.


The necklace boasts a handmade chain which is is about 19" long and can be made shorter or longer upon request. It can also be adjusted to a shorter length by closing the chain at any of the other links. The necklace closes in the back with a handmade hook. The necklace can also be customized. If you would only like a few of the decorative handmade links at the pendant and a lighter chain to complete the length, then please condo me.

Signed by the artist.

All Silver was oxidized and buffed to reveal highlight and details.

One of a kind.

MADE IN USA

name: Hoop Earrings Long Sterling Silver earrings B. Sasik
description:
Hoop Earrings
Sterling Silver Hoop Earrings

CONSTELLATION EARRINGS


There was a lot of Silver and time used to make these swinging hoops.

They are rather substantial and demand to be noticed as they swing and sway. 
The circle connector allows for even more movement.

I used Sterling Silver wire to fabricate these earrings.
They are entirely hand made one component at a time.

The circles are about 1 5/8".
The earrings are almost 3" long including the ear wires 2 7/8" to be exact. 


All Silver was oxidized for definition and contrast. The metal was then polished to a brighter shine for beautiful sparkle.

Beata Sasik Original Earrings

name: Paris Pendant Sterling Silver Pendant with HANDPAINTED Fused Glass Cab PARIS
description:
GILDED TOWER OF PARIS

This necklace was hand fabricated from Sterling Silver. It is a bit over 2 1/8" tall including the bail by about 1 " wide and features my signature hand painted fused glass cabochon. The paint I use is actually glass in paint form which once applied and fired fuses permanently with the base glass and cannot be washed off or removed. 
There is 22 K gold detail on the glass. The cab is bezel set in Fine Silver on an asymmetrical setting. There is a delicate lacy filigree detail and silver ball accents.
The metal was oxidized and buffed to reveal highlights on the raised areas and then buffed for extra shine and contrast.
Signed by the artist.

Please do convo me if you need a chain.

The glass cab is painted and fired in a kiln. This process is sometimes repeated several times to achieve the desired color and effect. The glass is annealed each time before it comes out of the kiln.

One of a kind.

MADE IN USA

name: Keum Boo Sterling Silver 24 k Gold Earrings LOTUS Dangle Earrings
description:
GOLDEN LOTUS EARRINGS

These handmade earrings have lots of 24k Gold fused onto Silver through the ancient process of Keum Boo. 
The surface has slightly textured satin finish
The earrings are attention getters. They are large yet special care was taken to ensure that they are lightweight.
The gold flashes as the earrings swing.

The earrings are about 3" long including the ear wires.
Bright Silver and Gold

Signed by the artist.

One of a kind
